hero.introText: I'm Alejandro Romero Stankevich, a junior web developer. Currently, I'm studying a Higher Degree in Web Development. I'm open to job and internship opportunities. I am located in Barcelona/Tarragonaüìç.

exp.description: I started a Full Stack Development course, which I initially studied on my own in my free time. The course includes Blockchain Development, an area I‚Äôm interested in exploring after consolidating my Web Development knowledge.
exp.description1: In September, I began a Higher Degree in Web Development at a school in Catalonia. The course lasts two years, and I‚Äôm already looking for work or internships.
exp.description2: On GitHub, you can see all my updates and almost my entire learning journey, including my contributions and how my skills have evolved over time.

aboutMe.intro: Hi! I'm Alejandro, a Higher Vocational Web Development student in Catalonia. I'm passionate about technology and frontend development, and I'm currently sharpening my skills with Astro, TailwindCSS, HTML, and CSS. I'm also learning JavaScript, Vue.js, and React, and I have knowledge of Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and basic Linux command line usage.
aboutMe.extra: At the same time, I'm taking a Blockchain Development course, aiming to specialize in it later. I consider myself proactive, with good teamwork skills, initiative, and a strong desire to keep learning and growing as a professional. üöÄ

contact.intro: I am currently creating small web pages to improve my skills in Astro, TailwindCSS, HTML, and CSS, as well as learning a bit of JavaScript and Vue.js. I am looking for a job to continue growing and contribute my knowledge to a dynamic team.
